name: Beaver Ponding Density Mismatch Factor (M_beaver)
functionStatement: Beaver/ponding occurs near expected levels, enhancing storage without excessive fragmentation.
descriptionMarkdown: Mismatch factor from expected beaver ponding density: M = max(O/E, E/O). Lower is better; minimum is 1.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Estimate observed ponding density; estimate expected (from reference/capacity); compute mismatch factor.

inputs.label: Beaver Ponding Density Mismatch Factor (M_beaver)
inputs.helpMarkdown: Field tally of beaver dams/ponds + predicted capacity model (O/E) or reference reach comparison.

sourceMetadata.metricDataSource: Field tally of beaver dams/ponds + predicted capacity model (O/E) or reference reach comparison.

referencesRaw: SFARI rapid assessment; beaver capacity/analog methods (where available).

stratifications.name: Proposed (derived from SFARI rapid curves) - Use beaver suitability/capacity stratification; separate naturally low-capacity systems.
